Author: suspiciousduck6
Text: yeah, at least in germany where i live, i think they have them in most of europe at least in all of the countries i´ve been to, don´t know about the US though...  I don´t really want to go to the doctors because my doctor is kind of weird, the last time I had to go there (which also was the first time i met the doctor cuz i  switched doctors) he told me i should "heal my inner child" when i just wanted to get my bloodwork done and leave lol  But now that you said it I´m considering it because at least I don´t have to deal with my anxiety when I go to the doctors... so thx for the idea :)
